response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth $15,000 to you. However, I understand that everyone appreciates a good deal, so I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product for $12,000. I hope this price aligns with your budget and allows us to bring this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 12000}
